about_the_game:
When viral legend “Skatehorse” is tragically killed saving a child from a speeding truck, the animal goes where all horses go - straight to horse hell. Impressed with his funny skateboarding though, Devilhorse offers him an accord - if he can grind out of the bowls purgatory, he may return to Earth. Do you have what it takes to bring America’s horse home?

Stick with the grind in this punishing platformer starring a skateboarding horse! Ride, brake, jump, and flip your way through 50 brief but diabolical levels to unlock an even more gruesome difficulty.

•Between 4 and 6 hours of tortuous platforming with a bonus difficulty offering another 4 to ∞ hours to prove your mastery!
•The precise platforming control you would expect of a horse using a skateboard.
•Interesting music!
•Interesting art!
•A fun and silly story with a wacky surprise for those up to finishing the game.

short_description: This Equestrian Rage Platformer stars a viral skateboarding horse who dies suddenly, and must grind, ollie and flip their way out of the hell out of PFFH (Purgatory For Famous Horses). Will you suffer a fate of damnation, or do you say neigh to death?
